· Development of the Anaplan components such as Lists, Modules line items, Dashboards, Workflows, Subsidiary views, List & Line item subset pertaining to demand and capacity across various functional areas.
· Designed and implemented allocation logic for data flow from regions to markets.
· Developed and published number of Anaplan dashboards for business analysis and forecast as per user requirement.
· Worked around complete lifecycle of project starting from build to successful Go Live over sprint cycles. Used ALM approach for data migration. Well versed with concept of Production lists.


 -------------------------------------------------


Client: Major Multinational Food Manufacturing Company		    	    Jul ’18 – Dec’18
Role: Anaplan Model Builder

Client produces cereal and convenience foods, including crackers and toaster pastries and markets their products by several well-known brands. Products are manufactured and marketed in over 180 countries. Anaplan was used to create ZBB application for the company. 

Responsibilities:
· Discussion and closely worked with Finance IT users on P&L, Balance Sheets and Cash Flows to design end to end solution for FP&A process for carving out a MENAT market from Europe.
· Caved out MENAT by performing Model changes, changes to the existing processes/actions and dashboards.
· Creating modules based on user stories for different sprints.
· Importing, exporting data and properties, actions, processes, list subsets, dashboards, charts.
· Developing logic formulas and calculations.
· Resolving defects after different release phases.
· Documentation as Run books, Train the trainer deck, Onboarding deck etc. Support user issues related to formulas, data validation, dashboards, SSO access, security, actions, production list changes, enhancements, automation and scheduling through Anaplan connect batch scripting.
· ALM Migration through revision tags.
